exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

tactic: inversion H as [x [H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]]]; subst; clear H.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros. split. - intros. inversion H; subst; clear H. + apply (PCPX_iff_dPCP.PCPX_derivable R). exists [exist _ rho H0]. repeat split; try discriminate. reflexivity. + discriminate. - intros. inversion H as [x [H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]]]; subst; clear H. inversion H1 as [H5 | H5]; subst; clear H1. + apply drv_prv, ex_intro; auto. + discriminate.
